page.title: 05THE VINEYARD AT CLOPTON
page.content: There is a small vineyard situated at Clopton. This is a family run small business started about 7 years ago. The grape vines are harvested and sent to another local vineyard for bottling. The wine is then sent back to Clopton for clearing by Customs and Excise before being sold to a hotel. This year the grapes have been very poor as a result of the bad winter of 1984 and they will not be harvested. This is the first time this has happened. The family also run the local Post Office from a room in their house.
